actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange all or part of certain parcels of National Forest System land in the State of Idaho and use the proceeds derived from the sale or exchange for National Forest System purposes.
short_title: Idaho Panhandle National Forest Improvement Act of 2002

summary.text: Idaho Panhandle National Forest Improvement Act of 2002 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange certain National Forest System lands in Idaho, and to use the proceeds to acquire or rehabilitate: (1) facilities for a new ranger station in the Silver Valley area of the Panhandle National Forest; and (2) other facilities in such Forest.Authorizes the Secretary to use other funds if sale or exchange proceeds are insufficient for the acquisition or improvement of the ranger station and associated land.

titles.title: Idaho Panhandle National Forest Improvement Act of 2002

A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange all or part of certain parcels of National Forest System land in the State of Idaho and use the proceeds derived from the sale or exchange for National Forest System purposes.
